```py
SELECT CAST(AVG(songs.year) as int) as avg_year FROM songs

-- | avg_year |
-- |----------|
-- | 934      |
```

```py
SELECT songs.year as median_year
FROM songs 
ORDER BY songs.year 
LIMIT 1 
OFFSET (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM songs) / 2

-- | median_year |
-- |-------------|
-- | 0           |
```

```py
SELECT 
    songs.year,
    COUNT(*) as count
FROM songs
GROUP BY songs.year
ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
LIMIT 1

-- | year | count |
-- |------|-------|
-- | 0    | 5320  |
```

```py
SELECT 
    MIN(songs.year) as min_year,
    MAX(songs.year) as max_year
FROM
    songs

-- | min_year | max_year |
-- |----------|----------|
-- | 0        | 2010     |
```

```py
SELECT 
    songs.year,
    COUNT(*) songs_count
FROM songs
GROUP BY songs.year
ORDER BY songs.year ASC

-- | year | song_count |
-- |------|------------|
-- | 0    | 5320       |
-- | 1926 | 2          |
-- | 1927 | 3          |
-- | ...  | ...        |
-- | 2009 | 250        |
-- | 2010 | 64         |
```
